MariMod:Mari_Strike.NAME: Strike
MariMod:Mari_Strike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !MARI_RADIANCE! marimod:Radiance. NL Downgrade this card.

MariMod:Mari_Glow.NAME: Glow
MariMod:Mari_Glow.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !MARI_RADIANCE! marimod:Radiance to ALL enemies.

MariMod:Mari_Glimmer.NAME: Glimmer
MariMod:Mari_Glimmer.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. NL marimod:Recall a marimod:Radiance card. Apply !MARI_RADIANCE! marimod:Radiance to ALL characters once for each [E] it costs.
MariMod:Mari_Glimmer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. Retain. NL marimod:Recall a marimod:Radiance card. Apply !MARI_RADIANCE! marimod:Radiance to ALL characters once for each [E] it costs.

MariMod:Mari_Shine.NAME: Shine
MariMod:Mari_Shine.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. NL Apply !MARI_RADIANCE! marimod:Radiance to ANY character. NL Apply 1 more for each debuff it has.

MariMod:Mari_Sparkle.NAME: Sparkle
MariMod:Mari_Sparkle.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !MARI_RADIANCE! marimod:Radiance. NL Draw a card.

MariMod:Mari_SHINY.NAME: "SHIIIIIINY!"
MariMod:Mari_SHINY.DESCRIPTION: Double ANY NL character's marimod:Radiance. NL Exhaust.
MariMod:Mari_SHINY.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double ALL NL characters' marimod:Radiance. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Defend.NAME: Defend
MariMod:Mari_Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL marimod:Kindle: Gain !B! more.

MariMod:Mari_Its_Joke.NAME: "It's Joke!"
MariMod:Mari_Its_Joke.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy loses NL !M! or more HP, NL heal it for !M! HP.

MariMod:Mari_The_FLYING_CAR.NAME: The FLYING CAR
MariMod:Mari_The_FLYING_CAR.DESCRIPTION: [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold to NL deal !D! damage and apply !MARI_RADIANCE! marimod:Radiance.

MariMod:Mari_The_MANSION.NAME: The MANSION
MariMod:Mari_The_MANSION.DESCRIPTION: [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold to NL gain !M! Block at the end of your turns. Each turn, the Block gain is halved.

MariMod:Mari_Choreography.NAME: Choreography
MariMod:Mari_Choreography.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you spend less energy on a card than the previous on the same turn, NL draw !M! card.
MariMod:Mari_Choreography.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you spend less energy on a card than the previous on the same turn, NL draw !M! card.

MariMod:Mari_Mic_Check.NAME: Mic Check
MariMod:Mari_Mic_Check.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put ALL cards with quotation marks in their names from your draw pile into your hand.

MariMod:Mari_Reminisce.NAME: Reminisce
MariMod:Mari_Reminisce.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. marimod:Invest !MARI_GOLD_COST!. NL marimod:Recall 1 of !M! special types of cards. NL Remove the option chosen this combat.

MariMod:Mari_Expensive_Tastes.NAME: Expensive Tastes
MariMod:Mari_Expensive_Tastes.DESCRIPTION: Rearrange your draw pile by energy cost. NL (Expensive on top) NL marimod:Kindle: The top card costs 0 until played.

MariMod:Mari_Devilish_Assistant.NAME: Devilish Assistant
MariMod:Mari_Devilish_Assistant.DESCRIPTION: The last card you play each turn is replayed at the start of the next turn for free. NL (Does not self-trigger)

MariMod:Mari_Character_Development.NAME: Character Development
MariMod:Mari_Character_Development.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you fully lose a debuff, NL gain 2 Strength.

MariMod:Mari_Shining_Tornado.NAME: "Mari's Shining Tornado!"
MariMod:Mari_Shining_Tornado.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !MARI_RADIANCE! marimod:Radiance to a random enemy !M! times.

MariMod:Mari_Tough_Front.NAME: Tough Front
MariMod:Mari_Tough_Front.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Repressed to the bottom of your exhaust pile.

MariMod:Mari_Reckless_Driving.NAME: Reckless Driving
MariMod:Mari_Reckless_Driving.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Repressed to the bottom of your exhaust pile.

MariMod:Mari_Cash_Back.NAME: Cash Back
MariMod:Mari_Cash_Back.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. NL Lose 10% marimod:Invested Gold. NL At the end of combat, marimod:Payout !M!%.

MariMod:Mari_Delicacy.NAME: Delicacy
MariMod:Mari_Delicacy.DESCRIPTION: One time each turn, when you [#fbccff]spend[] Gold, gain Block equal to gold [#fbccff]spent[].

MariMod:Mari_Debut.NAME: Debut
MariMod:Mari_Debut.DESCRIPTION: Innate. marimod:Fading. NL Apply !MARI_RADIANCE! marimod:Radiance to ALL characters. NL If marimod:Recalled, play and Purge this card.

MariMod:Mari_Golden_Glint.NAME: Golden Glint
MariMod:Mari_Golden_Glint.DESCRIPTION: [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold to NL gain !MARI_RADIANCE! marimod:Radiance and !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Flaunt.NAME: Flaunt
MariMod:Mari_Flaunt.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Invest !MARI_GOLD_COST!. NL Deal !D! damage. NL The next time you marimod:Invest Gold, deal damage to ALL enemies equal to Gold marimod:Invested.
MariMod:Mari_Flaunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: marimod:Invest !MARI_GOLD_COST!. NL Deal !D! damage. NL The next !M! times you marimod:Invest Gold, deal damage to ALL enemies equal to Gold marimod:Invested.

MariMod:Mari_Expenses.NAME: Expenses
MariMod:Mari_Expenses.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for every 5 Gold [#fbccff]spent[] this combat.

MariMod:Mari_The_Planisphere.NAME: The Planisphere
MariMod:Mari_The_Planisphere.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. NL Choose 1 of 3 cards to add to your hand. marimod:Kindle: Gain [E] equal to its cost.

MariMod:Mari_Overexertion.NAME: Overexertion
MariMod:Mari_Overexertion.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Reduce the cost of cards drawn to 1 this turn. NL Gain 1 Frail and Vulnerable.

MariMod:Mari_Spontaneous_Strike.NAME: Spontaneous Strike
MariMod:Mari_Spontaneous_Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL twice the total cost of all other cards in your hand.
MariMod:Mari_Spontaneous_Strike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL 3 + twice the total cost of all other cards in your hand.

MariMod:Mari_Tea_Time.NAME: Tea Time
MariMod:Mari_Tea_Time.DESCRIPTION: [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold to purge any number of cards in your exhaust pile. NL marimod:Kindle: marimod:Recall a marimod:Radiance card. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Well_Kept_Secret.NAME: Well-Kept Secret
MariMod:Mari_Well_Kept_Secret.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and keep your Block at the start of your next turn. NL marimod:Kindle: Retain your hand this turn.

MariMod:Mari_$Memories_Of_Uchiura.NAME: Memories Of Uchiura
MariMod:Mari_$Memories_Of_Uchiura.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Recall a marimod:Radiance card. NL ( marimod:Radiance cards directly apply marimod:Radiance. )

MariMod:Mari_$Memories_Of_Performance.NAME: Memories Of Performance
MariMod:Mari_$Memories_Of_Performance.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Recall a card that has quotation marks in its name.

MariMod:Mari_Shut_Up.NAME: "Shut uuuuuup!"
MariMod:Mari_Shut_Up.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength NL this turn. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.
MariMod:Mari_Shut_Up.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: GAIN !M! STRENGTH THIS TURN!!! NL ENEMY LOSES !M! STRENGTH THIS TURN!!! NL marimod:EXHAAAUST (!!!)

MariMod:Mari_Lets_Go.NAME: "Let's Go!"
MariMod:Mari_Lets_Go.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E] for each 3 cost card drawn.

MariMod:Mari_Defiance.NAME: Defiance
MariMod:Mari_Defiance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose 1 Frail to gain !B! more Block.

MariMod:Mari_Undying_Spark.NAME: Undying Spark
MariMod:Mari_Undying_Spark.DESCRIPTION: Apply !MARI_RADIANCE! marimod:Radiance. After you gain Frail, marimod:Recall this card. NL Exhaust.
MariMod:Mari_Undying_Spark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !MARI_RADIANCE! marimod:Radiance. After you gain Frail or Vulnerable, marimod:Recall this card. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_zzz.NAME: zzz...?
MariMod:Mari_zzz.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw this card, gain !B! Block and 1 Vulnerable. NL marimod:Kindle: Gain [E] and lose 2 Vulnerable.

MariMod:Mari_Second_Season.NAME: Second Season
MariMod:Mari_Second_Season.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. NL Return marimod:Radiance cards from your exhaust pile to your draw pile, they cost 0 until played.

MariMod:Mari_Pretty_Bomber_Head.NAME: "Pretty Bomber Head!"
MariMod:Mari_Pretty_Bomber_Head.DESCRIPTION: Become Confused. NL Draw !M! more card each turn.

MariMod:Mari_The_Light_We_Chase.NAME: The Light We Chase
MariMod:Mari_The_Light_We_Chase.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy gains marimod:Radiance, you gain 1 marimod:Radiance !M! times.
MariMod:Mari_The_Light_We_Chase.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Whenever an enemy gains marimod:Radiance, you gain 1 marimod:Radiance !M! times.

MariMod:Mari_The_GOLDEN_STATUE.NAME: The GOLDEN STATUE
MariMod:Mari_The_GOLDEN_STATUE.DESCRIPTION: [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold to NL gain !B! Block and deal !D! damage.

MariMod:Mari_The_HELICOPTER.NAME: The HELICOPTER
MariMod:Mari_The_HELICOPTER.DESCRIPTION: [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold to NL deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

MariMod:Mari_Pent_Up_Emotions.NAME: Pent-up Emotions
MariMod:Mari_Pent_Up_Emotions.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw this card, gain 1 Frail. NL Gain [E] , deal !D! damage, and lose 2 Frail.

MariMod:Mari_No_Problem.NAME: "No Problem!"
MariMod:Mari_No_Problem.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Vulnerable and add 2 *Repressed to the bottom of your exhaust pile. Next turn, marimod:Recall !M! marimod:Radiance cards. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Boundless_Energy.NAME: Boundless Energy
MariMod:Mari_Boundless_Energy.DESCRIPTION: [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold to NL gain !M! [E] and draw !M! cards. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Supervision.NAME: Supervision
MariMod:Mari_Supervision.DESCRIPTION: Set the cost of ALL your cards to 2. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E] [E] [E].

MariMod:Mari_Practice_Outfit.NAME: Practice Outfit
MariMod:Mari_Practice_Outfit.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. NL Give ANY character !B! Block. NL Whenever its Block is broken, it gains 1 marimod:Radiance and 5 Block.

MariMod:Mari_Limelight.NAME: Limelight
MariMod:Mari_Limelight.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, apply !MARI_RADIANCE! marimod:Radiance to ALL characters.

MariMod:Mari_From_Zero.NAME: From Zero...
MariMod:Mari_From_Zero.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you spend 0 [E] on a card, exhaust the card, draw a card, and apply !MARI_RADIANCE! marimod:Radiance to a random enemy.
MariMod:Mari_From_Zero.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you spend 0 [E] on a card, exhaust the card, draw a card, and apply !MARI_RADIANCE! marimod:Radiance to a random enemy.

MariMod:Mari_Fire_Strike.NAME: Fire Strike
MariMod:Mari_Fire_Strike.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. NL Apply !MARI_RADIANCE! marimod:Radiance to an enemy X times.
MariMod:Mari_Fire_Strike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. NL Apply !MARI_RADIANCE! marimod:Radiance to an enemy X+1 times.

MariMod:Mari_Administrator_Privilege.NAME: Administrator Privilege
MariMod:Mari_Administrator_Privilege.DESCRIPTION: [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold. NL Instead of drawing regularly, you choose cards from your draw pile to put into your hand at the start of your turn.
MariMod:Mari_Administrator_Privilege.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold. NL Instead of drawing regularly, you choose cards from your draw pile to put into your hand at the start of your turn.

MariMod:Mari_All_Or_Nothing.NAME: "All or Nothing!"
MariMod:Mari_All_Or_Nothing.DESCRIPTION: Set the cost of ALL your cards to 0 or 3, randomly. NL marimod:Kindle: Does not affect 0-cost cards. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Perfect_Performance.NAME: Perfect Performance
MariMod:Mari_Perfect_Performance.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Can only be played if you have NL spent 1, 2, and 3 [E] on cards this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Can only be played if you have NL spent

MariMod:Mari_Slap.NAME: Slap!
MariMod:Mari_Slap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! more damage for each debuff you received this turn and last enemy turn.

MariMod:Mari_Approved.NAME: "Approved!"
MariMod:Mari_Approved.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy if it does not intend to attack. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: That enemy wants to attack. Not approved!

MariMod:Mari_Dolphin_Strike.NAME: Dolphin Strike
MariMod:Mari_Dolphin_Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL marimod:Kindle: Deal damage an extra time.

MariMod:Mari_Self_Care.NAME: Self-Care
MariMod:Mari_Self_Care.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Invest !MARI_GOLD_COST!. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card. NL marimod:Kindle: Purge a card in your exhaust pile.

MariMod:Mari_Awe.NAME: Awe
MariMod:Mari_Awe.DESCRIPTION: Repeat !M! times: NL marimod:Kindle: Gain 1 Strength and [E].

MariMod:Mari_Higher_Ups.NAME: Higher-Ups
MariMod:Mari_Higher_Ups.DESCRIPTION: Choose ANY Mari card to add to your hand. Reduce its cost to 0 this turn and [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold for each [E] reduced. NL Exhaust.
MariMod:Mari_Higher_Ups.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose ANY Upgraded Mari card to add to your hand. Reduce its cost to 0 this turn and [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold for each [E] reduced. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Wishing_Fountain.NAME: Wishing Fountain
MariMod:Mari_Wishing_Fountain.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Gold and [E]. NL Lose any unspent Gold from this card next turn. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Flawless_Form.NAME: Flawless Form
MariMod:Mari_Flawless_Form.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you spend more energy on a card than the previous on the same turn, gain [E].
MariMod:Mari_Flawless_Form.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Whenever you spend more energy on a card than the previous on the same turn, gain [E].

MariMod:Mari_Heavy_Metal.NAME: Heavy Metal
MariMod:Mari_Heavy_Metal.DESCRIPTION: Remove and apply all your Vulnerable to ALL enemies, then deal !D! damage to them.

MariMod:Mari_Stewshine.NAME: Stewshine!
MariMod:Mari_Stewshine.DESCRIPTION: Play three combined cards. NL (Special Relic Card.)

MariMod:Mari_Grand_Scheme.NAME: Grand Scheme
MariMod:Mari_Grand_Scheme.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. NL Gain 15 Gold !M! times. At the start of your next !M! turns, [#fbccff]spend[] 15 Gold.

MariMod:Mari_Collect_Thoughts.NAME: Collect Thoughts
MariMod:Mari_Collect_Thoughts.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a copy of your hand into your draw pile. NL marimod:Kindle: Upgrade your hand first. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Lock_On.NAME: "Lock on!"
MariMod:Mari_Lock_On.DESCRIPTION: Choose an enemy. After you target that enemy with a card this turn, gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Hug.NAME: Hug
MariMod:Mari_Hug.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Lose 1 Frail to Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable.

MariMod:Mari_Oh_My_God.NAME: "Oh My God!"
MariMod:Mari_Oh_My_God.DESCRIPTION: Play and Exhaust a copy of the last Attack added to your deck on ALL attacking enemies. NL Exhaust.
MariMod:Mari_Oh_My_God.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play and Exhaust a copy of the last Attack added to your deck on ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Calm down! No one's not attacking!

MariMod:Mari_Old_Costume.NAME: Old Costume
MariMod:Mari_Old_Costume.DESCRIPTION: Target ANY character. It gains !M! Block and 1 Vulnerable.
MariMod:Mari_Old_Costume.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Target ANY character. It gains !M! Block and 1 Vulnerable. NL Gain !B! Block.

MariMod:Mari_Closure.NAME: Closure
MariMod:Mari_Closure.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and permanently decrease the Block by 2. NL Can be upgraded any number of times to increase Block by !M!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Can be upgraded any number of times to increase Block by !M!. NL (...Did we save it?)

MariMod:Mari_Withdrawal.NAME: Withdrawal
MariMod:Mari_Withdrawal.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain a debuff, gain !M! Block.

MariMod:Mari_Reflection.NAME: Reflection
MariMod:Mari_Reflection.DESCRIPTION: [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold to target ANY character. Apply its marimod:Radiance to ALL other characters. NL Exhaust.
MariMod:Mari_Reflection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold to target ANY character. Apply its marimod:Radiance to ALL other characters.

MariMod:Mari_Fragile_Hope.NAME: Fragile Hope
MariMod:Mari_Fragile_Hope.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. NL Gain 1 Frail. NL marimod:Recall a marimod:Radiance card.
MariMod:Mari_Fragile_Hope.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. Retain. NL Gain 1 Frail. NL marimod:Recall a marimod:Radiance card.

MariMod:Mari_Research.NAME: Research
MariMod:Mari_Research.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you successfully marimod:Kindle an enemy, it loses !M! Strength for a turn.

MariMod:Mari_Excitement.NAME: Excitement
MariMod:Mari_Excitement.DESCRIPTION: After drawing 3 cards in a turn, whenever you draw a card, gain !M! marimod:Radiance.

MariMod:Mari_Lie_In_Wait.NAME: Lie In Wait
MariMod:Mari_Lie_In_Wait.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Glaring. NL If marimod:Recalled, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL marimod:Kindle: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Emotional_Episode.NAME: Emotional Episode
MariMod:Mari_Emotional_Episode.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. NL Gain !B! Block and 1 Frail. NL Gain !M! Gold for each debuff you have.

MariMod:Mari_The_Beach_Episode.NAME: Beach Episode
MariMod:Mari_The_Beach_Episode.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. NL Remove up to !M! Block from ANY character. Gain 2 Gold for each Block Removed.

MariMod:Mari_Introduction_Episode.NAME: Introduction Episode
MariMod:Mari_Introduction_Episode.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain 3 Gold for each card in your hand.

MariMod:Mari_Filler_Episode.NAME: Filler Episode
MariMod:Mari_Filler_Episode.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. NL Gain 5 gold for each card in your hand. NL Retain !M! cards and end your turn.

MariMod:Mari_Unveiled_Secret.NAME: Unveiled Secret
MariMod:Mari_Unveiled_Secret.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. NL [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold. NL Draw a card. NL Gain !M! Gold if you start your next turn with no Block.

MariMod:Mari_Reckless_Spending.NAME: Reckless Spending
MariMod:Mari_Reckless_Spending.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. NL [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold. NL Draw a card. NL Gain !M! Gold if you do not lose HP until your next turn.

MariMod:Mari_Drama1.NAME: Drama 1
MariMod:Mari_Drama1.DESCRIPTION: For the rest of combat, your stacks of Frail can be used as [E].
MariMod:Mari_Drama1.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For the rest of combat, your stacks of Frail and Vulnerable can be used as [E].

MariMod:Mari_Drama2.NAME: Drama 2
MariMod:Mari_Drama2.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Swap your Frail and Vulnerable. Gain 1 Frail.

MariMod:Mari_Let_Loose.NAME: Let Loose
MariMod:Mari_Let_Loose.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] and deal !D! damage, then discard cards in your hand that cannot be played and deal !D! damage for each.

MariMod:Mari_Repression.NAME: Repression
MariMod:Mari_Repression.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Glaring. NL If marimod:Recalled, gain 1 Frail or Vulnerable. NL Purge when discarded.

MariMod:Mari_Aspiration.NAME: Infinite Aspiration
MariMod:Mari_Aspiration.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. NL At the start of your turn, gain infinite [E].

MariMod:Mari_Shiny_Swap.NAME: Shiny Swap
MariMod:Mari_Shiny_Swap.DESCRIPTION: marimod:Fading. NL marimod:Recall a marimod:Radiance card. NL Exhaust a card. NL Put a card on top of your draw pile.

MariMod:Mari_Glow??? ALL CARDS BEYOND TH.NAME: Glow
MariMod:Mari_Glow??? ALL CARDS BEYOND TH.DESCRIPTION: Swap any character's marimod:Radiance with this card's. Has !M! marimod:Radiance.

MariMod:Mari_Glimmer???.NAME: Glimmer
MariMod:Mari_Glimmer???.DESCRIPTION: Apply and remove !M! marimod:Radiance from an enemy twice. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Sparkle???.NAME: Sparkle
MariMod:Mari_Sparkle???.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2(3) cards. NL Apply marimod:Radiance to ALL characters equal to the highest cost of the cards drawn. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Indulgence.NAME: Indulgence
MariMod:Mari_Indulgence.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you spend 3 or more [E] on a card, reduce the cost of other cards in your hand by 2 this combat (but not less than 1).
MariMod:Mari_Indulgence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you [#fbccff]spend[] 3 or more [E] on a card, reduce the cost of other cards in your hand by 2 this combat (but not less than 1). NL Innate.

MariMod:Mari_Desserts.NAME: Desserts
MariMod:Mari_Desserts.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you end a turn with any unspent [E] , gain that much [E] at the start of your next turn (up to !M!).

MariMod:Mari_Idolize.NAME: Idolize
MariMod:Mari_Idolize.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold to NL upgrade ALL cards in your draw pile with two or more copies. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Formation_Book.NAME: Formation Book
MariMod:Mari_Formation_Book.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle four different AqoursÂ performances with different costs into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Gleam_And_Glean.NAME: Gleam and Glean
MariMod:Mari_Gleam_And_Glean.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply marimod:Radiance to an enemy, gain !M! Gold.

MariMod:Mari_Test_Card.NAME: Test Card
MariMod:Mari_Test_Card.DESCRIPTION: For the rest of combat, your stacks of Frail can be used as [E].
MariMod:Mari_Test_Card.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For the rest of combat, your stacks of Frail and Vulnerable can be used as [E].
